Segment.name: TOA
Segment.comment: To specify type of activity information

Field.name: TypeOfActivityCode
Field.comment: Code specifying the type of activity

Field.name: LicenseTypeCode
Field.comment: Code specifying the type of license

Field.name: StatusCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the status of a business transaction, such as a claim, policy, real estate, or securities transaction

Field.name: TypeOfRatingCode1
Field.comment: Code specifying the level of participation

Field.name: TypeOfRatingCode2
Field.comment: Code specifying the level of participation
